resources.string: Your device does not support dynamic partitions (DSU requires dynamic partitions).
You need to select a folder to be used as application storage (required to store temporary files).\n\nPlease select or create a new folder and allow access to it.
You have less than %1$s%% of free storage, installation process will fail, please free up some space.

DSU Sideloader requires READ_LOGS permission (which allows logcat reading).
This permission is used to obtain installation progress and diagnose errors in DSU installation.

** Granting this permission may require a application restart.
Waiting service to grant permission, please wait…

DSU Sideloader requires unlocked bootloader, installing images with locked bootloader may be dangerous in some devices, before using this app, you: 
- MUST unlock bootloader.
- MUST have some way to restore device stock firmware.
- RECOMMENDED to do a full backup.
This app have been made to be used by developers and advanced users, you have been warned.
Select a file to be installed
A DSU installation is already present.
Installation will be made using the parameters shown below:
All data present in installed DSU will be DELETED after discarding, are you sure?
Installation prompt invoked, waiting user confirmation to proceed..
Preparation done, a command is required to proceed with installation.
Installing a DSU when running an installed DSU is not supported, please reboot your device to default OS.
A DSU installation is already present, discard to continue?\n\n**All data stored in DSU installation will be deleted.
Allocation on sdcard isn\'t working, there are some fixes you can try:\n - Install DSU Sideloader Magisk\'s module.\n - Unmount sdcard (you can set this option permanently in settings).
Android requires at least %1$s%% of free storage to proceed installation, free up some space and try again.
Your kernel is likely to be registering f2fs in different path that one expected from GSI daemon, there are some fixes you can try:\n - Install DSU Sideloader Magisk\'s module.\n - Changing kernel.

Looks like SELinux denials are preventing DSU installation, there are some fixes you can try:
 - Install DSU Sideloader Magisk's module.
 - If you're using a sdcard, try to unmount it (there is a option for that in settings section).
 - Change your SELinux to permissive (not recommended, weakens your device security).
On Android 10 devices, images/filesystem needs to have more than 512 extents, there are some fixes you can try:\n - Install DSU Sideloader Magisk\'s module.
All progress made will be lost, are you sure?
Image installed successfully, check your notifications to boot into dynamic system.
DSU Sideloader will set this parameter for you automatically, setting image size manually is strongly inadvisable.

DSU (Dynamic System Updates) is a feature introduced in Android 10 that allow developers to test Android system images without touching device partitions, with Android 11, DSU can also replace multiple partitions.
This feature is under testing and may be unstable, are you sure?
Faster, use internal APIs to install images directly
DSU installation will allocate some free space on your device, disabling storage checks may let into errors.\nThis option is not recommended. Only continue if you know what you\'re doing!
Disable userdata storage checking, not recommended
Logs section will capture logs with no filters, may degrade app performance

string.name: translators_list
string.comment: Hello translator, since you have translated our app, feel free to put your name inside "translators_list", it will be shown on about screen. If there is more than one translator, append names and separate each one by using a comma, like: Collaborator 1, Collaborator 2, Collaborator 3

resources.string: People that helped with this project
To start installation on non-rooted devices, you need to run this command on adb shell:
If you\'re running adb shell without PC (eg: LADB, Shizuku\'s Rish, WebADB, Bugjaeger..), you should run this command instead:
Once it\'s done, check your notifications to follow installation process, you can also close this app.
